body: @bigworm was able to fix #465 with this. see that issue on how to test this.

if i merge your branch into stable5 and create a file with the sync client i get this error multiple times:


in the best of all worlds i would like the following to be possible: when uploading a file in the browser ui or via webdav, opening a second web ui in a new browser window or tab should show me the progress of the file upload. go figure ...

hmm, i think a file that is currently uploaded and not completely on the server yet should not be visible in the (logic) file system at all. it should appear once its uploaded and not earlier, also not its parts. the upload progress should only be visible to the instance that does the upload.
sorry, rebased to master. wil lcreate new pr to master and backport this to stable5
